channel.title: Eluthia || Iron Man || Grand Exchange || Great Community
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/t020k6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/r08nbr.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.eluthia.com/community"]Community Forums[/URL]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2rnipep.png[/img][URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/nfr91bhclan0k3w/Eluthia.jar"]Start Your Adventure[/URL]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/24ywb2s.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.eluthia.com/community"]Highscores - Coming Soon![/URL]
Eluthia, previously was known & considered an Oldschool-themed 474 revision server, though due to lack of prosperity the decision was made a couple of months a go to convert. Here we are now, striving for success in our first day of launch. In good pride & determination, we hope to make a resounding impact on those who join Eluthia.
- Automated Vote - 100% Player-based Grand Exchange. - Well-Revised Economy basis - IPB Forums & Professional Layout - Variety of Bosses & Minigames to encounter.
[SPOILER=Media][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/206zdpd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/sywoj5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/6h8h0i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2n7qblk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2h84cx4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/ofadew.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/242x474.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2qsuzy1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ngvnfa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/11gllrk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5o8q1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2vx3qdj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/1693m9e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2n0mrzb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/mqxba.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/fdaek3.png[/img]
[/SPOILER][/CENTER] [CENTER] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/287hqpi.png[/img]
[B]Note:[/B] All feedback is appreciated...
Thankyou, [/CENTER] Alex.

[URL=http://“http://www.eluthia.com/community”]Highscores - Coming Soon![/URL]

Eluthia, previously was known & considered an Oldschool-themed 474 revision server, though due to lack of prosperity the decision was made a couple of months a go to convert.
Here we are now, striving for success in our first day of launch. In good pride & determination, we hope to make a resounding impact on those who join Eluthia.

  • Automated Vote
  • 100% Player-based Grand Exchange.
  • Well-Revised Economy basis
  • IPB Forums & Professional Layout
  • Variety of Bosses & Minigames to encounter.

[/CENTER]
